City Council & Mayor
====================

Meetings
--------

* 7 p.m.
* Second and fourth Thursday of each month
* City Council Chambers  
  833 S. Spruce St.  
  Burlington, WA 98233

Usual exceptions are the second meeting in November, which is moved to the Tuesday of that week to avoid Thanksgiving. The second meeting in December is often cancelled to avoid the holidays.

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agenda](http://chrome-extension://efaidnbmnnnibpcajpcglclefindmkaj/https://burlingtonwa.gov/AgendaCenter/ViewFile/Agenda/851?html=true)  |  [View All Agendas and Minutes](https://burlingtonwa.gov/AgendaCenter/City-Council-3)  |  [View City Council Voting Records](https://burlingtonwa.gov/967/City-Council-Voting-Record)

Members
-------

Seven council members serve the City of Burlington in a mayor-council form of government. Burlington consists of six council wards with one candidate elected from each ward. The seventh council member serves in the at-large position. All councilors are elected to four-year terms, including the mayor.

* [Bill Aslett](https://burlingtonwa.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=25 "Bill Aslett"), Mayor  
  Current Term Expires: December 31, 2025
* [Joe DeGloria](https://burlingtonwa.gov/directory.aspx?EID=45)  
  Member At-Large, Current Term Expires: December 31, 2025
* [Elizabeth Turman-Bryant](https://burlingtonwa.gov/directory.aspx?EID=65)  
  Ward 3, Current Term Expires: December 31, 2027
* [Dr. Jesús Pérez-Linares](https://burlingtonwa.gov/directory.aspx?EID=69)   
  Ward 6, Current Term Expires: December 31, 2025

* [Kelsey Freeman](https://burlingtonwa.gov/Directory.aspx?EID=14)  
  Ward 2, Current Term Expires: December 31, 2027
* [Jamie Weiss](http://www.burlingtonwa.gov/Directory.aspx?EID=15)  
  Ward 5, Current Term Expires: December 31, 2025
* [Scott Green](http://burlingtonwa.gov/Directory.aspx?EID=16)  
  Ward 1, Current Term Expires: December 31, 2027
* [James Stavig](https://burlingtonwa.gov/directory.aspx?EID=46)  
  Ward 4, Current Term Expires: December 31, 2025

The council wards were restructured in 2012 based on the 2010 census so that population is similar in each ward. Read the [summary of the revision to the council ward boundaries (PDF)](https://burlingtonwa.gov/DocumentCenter/View/10 "summary of the revision to the council ward boundaries"). View a [map of the city council wards (PDF)](https://burlingtonwa.gov/DocumentCenter/View/6372/2025-Ward-Map).
